RelatedSentence: BANGKOK -  Thailand 's acting prime minister has met with a group of senators to seek a solution to the country 's ongoing political crisis , as anti-government protesters continue to pressure the Cabinet to resign .

BANGKOK -  Thailand 's acting prime minister has met with a group of senators to seek a solution to the country 's ongoing political crisis , as anti-government protesters continue to pressure the Cabinet to resign .
A participant said Niwattumrong Boonsongpaisan 's government indicated Monday it is willing to cooperate with the Senate but refused to step down because that might violate the constitution .
